title: "cleaning"
output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

load("pre.rda")
pre_raw <- da37024.0001 %>% 
  clean_names() 

pre <- pre_raw %>% 
  select(id = respid, 
         wgt = pweight, 
         ethnicity = raceeth, 
         racegroup = race,
         state = rstate,
         gender = s7,
         education = s8,
         nativity1 = q1_3a,
         nativity2 = q1_3b,
         legality = q1_4,
         income1 = q8_15,
         income2 = q8_16,
         age1 = s5a,
         age2 = q8_19,
         reg = q4_1,
         votepred = q4_5e,
         party = q7_1,
         partycloser1 = q7_4a,
         partycloser2 = q7_4b,
         favorbo = q4_11c,
         favordt = q4_11d,
         favorhc = q4_11e)

load("post.rda")
post_raw <- da37380.0001 %>% 
  clean_names()

post <- post_raw %>% 
  select(id = respid,
         wgt = nweightnativity,
         ethnicity = s10_1,
         racegroup = race,
         state = rstate,
         gender = s7,
         education = s8,
         nativity1 = q1_3a,
         nativity2 = q1_3b,
         legality = q1_4,
         income1 = q10_15,
         income2 = q10_16,
         age1 = age2,
         age2 = q10_19,
         reg = q2_3,
         vote = q2_4,
         voteres = q2_4a,
         party = pid4,
         partycloser1 = q10_0d,
         partycloser2 = q10_0e,
         favorbo = q2_2c,
         favordt = q2_2a,
         favorhc = q2_2b)

write_csv(pre, "pre.csv")
write_csv(post, "post.csv")
```
